website_summaries.verdict: The design of this inexpensive brush and pan combo helps it to get into the corners well.
pros: Pointed brush helps get into the cracks
Pan has a rubber edge to help it make a good seal with the floor so you can pick up more debris
Teeth on the dust pan helps to get hair out of the brush
Cleans easily with soap and water
Doesn't scatter the dust while picking it up
cons: The width on this dust pan is a little narrower than others available

website_summaries.verdict: Choose this little broom if you like its angular design, although it does come with some longevity and durability concerns.
pros: Generates praise for its angled design that makes collecting dirt from corners and crevices easy
Perfect size – not too small or too large
Comes with a dustpan that has a built-in comb for removing particles from the broom
cons: Bristles have the tendency to fall out
Plastic material is on the thin and flimsy side and has been reported to crack or break

customer_reviews.title: you won't like it. It feels weird in my left hand
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, I should've read the reviews! If you're a lefty, you won't like it. It feels weird in my left hand, which is my favorite hand! Boo! South paws, UNITE!! Otherwise, its awesome. Thick rubber lip, narrow bin for easy trash dumping, soft-ish bristles (not too soft, juuust right), handy hangy hole. Wish it had more bristles, like more dense britslte distribution, know what I mean? But I suppose its sufficient for dust. I just liked the brush in this set:  The clorox set has a flimsy rubber lip that fell apart immediately. But I kept the brush because I like it so much. It just doesn't fit in the handle of any other dust pan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt impressed with the broom itself. As you can see from the pics, the bristles are set far apart, there's light between them which means crumbs will sneak through. I tested the broom on some breadcrumbs that were shaken out of the toaster, and all sorts of bits were missed, like little trails in the crumb pile. Youll be sweeping all day with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Willy Brownshoe Brown

customer_reviews.title: Smart Design, Weak Broom
customer_reviews.text: This broom has a lot to offer bc of its smart design: nice grip, foldable dust pan, hand sweeper and click and lock feature so it all fits nicely together. Although the one down side is that the actual bristles are not very resilent, so it doesn't sweep as well as I'd like. It's not angled to help with hard to reach corners. And since that's its main use, it's not actually that helpful. So I think as cool as it is, I would have rather bought the average broom. If the bristles were nicer, this would be hands down the most functional broom I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Brookeacc

customer_reviews.title: It's so nice when something works the way it should
customer_reviews.text: Such a simple concept. It's difficult finding the perfect dustpan yet this is it. The brush has an angled tip that gets into corners... genius! The best part is the small strip of rubber that edges the pan, actually lays flat, unlike countless other brands I've tried. I am no longer chasing crumbs around the floor.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Better for right-handed people
customer_reviews.text: I generally love Casabella products and was surprised to find that this dustpan is really made for right-handed people, which I am not one of. The brush is not very comfortable when held in the left hand. I thought we were long beyond having products that weren't "ambidextrous" ... apart from that the quality is good and I don't dislike it enough to return it but I would not recommend ordering it if you are left-handed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect, all the heights are right
customer_reviews.text: We have a 1 year old that is just a crumb machine, gold fish and cheerios fly off in all directions at high velocities. Sweeping is an hourly activity in our house now days and I daresay I find it nearly enjoyable now that we have this set. Its perfect, all the heights are right, the bucket snaps in and out of place nice, goes together well, the broom part is good quality. I've done more sweeping in the last month alone than in the past 30 years, so consider us your testing team, this set will serve you well.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: The best dustpan ever
customer_reviews.text: I never expected to write a review for a dustpan... That was before I tried replacing our lost Casabella dustpan and found all others lacking in comparison. Bristles do the job and it pans dust... but somehow much more easily and reliably than more expensive sets I've tried in the meantime. Sits flat against the wall on a hook. I took this thing for granted (three clumsy children in the house - a dustpan is a daily tool). They went out of stock and I ended up buying, giving away, or binning several before I was able to buy this replacement. Back to chasing whatever the hell that is on the floor with ease.
customer_reviews.author: ACB

customer_reviews.title: It cracked. The dustpan cracked before I even used it once!
customer_reviews.text: I suppose I should attach a photo... but I won't because I'm embarassed that instead of throwing this dud away, I instead taped it up with clear duct tape and am still using it. Figured I would be using it infrequently so yeah, I duct taped it. It holds tape well...So i guess there's that. So yes, buyer do beware, the plastic that the dust bin is made of is incredibly thin.. I pulled it out of the box and the handle cracked, straight down the middle to the left side of the bin. *sigh*
customer_reviews.author: DVSeattle

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Surprised this thing drives me crazy...it's just a dustpan but the lip of the pan, is more of a rigid strip than flexible and you can't quite get all of the dirt up over the edge. Grrrrrr.
customer_reviews.author: sharon cleveland

customer_reviews.title: The picture makes it look like it's high quality
customer_reviews.text: The picture makes it look like it's high quality. Looks can be deceiving. The rubber dust seal at the bottom of the pan fell off as soon as I took it out of the box. I've tried to glue it but it won't stay on. I have no idea how this could be so highly rated. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: cjraye

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well, just don't step on it
customer_reviews.text: So, it's a simple brush and a dustpan. But it's better than average. Between myself and the cat, hair sometimes piles up; the brush is good at picking it up, and the teeth at the back of the dustpan are good at getting the hair off the brush. I've had two of these and I lost the first one when I stepped on it and it cracked. My fault for not watching where I step, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Hopeful, but Cynic

customer_reviews.title: I like this dustpan
customer_reviews.text: Who knew there was something to like about a dustpan?! Its good quality. The rubber at the lip helps, so its better than other plastic dustpans. The body is deep so nothing falls out or sprays out when its swept in. No it doesn't sweep in every tiny bit of dirt on the first sweep, but it gets way more than other dustpans. I find the frustration free method of damp paper towel is best way to get that last minuscule line of dirt anyway. The brush that comes with it is good, on all surfaces and snaps in to the handle and stays. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tina R.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and thin dustpan. It will break.
customer_reviews.text: The dustpan came in broke. Its thin cheap material. I mean really flimsy. The brush on the other hand. Feels much more sturdy and fits my needs exactly. I'm not returning it because I do like the brush. It's not super fine nor its it super thick. It's just right for cleaning my mess on a job site. (Commercial electrican)
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: really nice! love that it will hold the broom and stand on its own too. The handle is just long enough for me and my 6' hubs so he can help too. The broom is now used two or sometimes three times a day. I will say the first dust pan arrived broken where it hinges to allow the dust pan up or down but Amazon sent me another fast! Even before I got the broken one dropped off for a return. I'm very please with both the sweep set and Amazon. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this replace a very inadequate dustpan and brush set I'd bought from Ikea that had me chasing cat litter across the room. The brush on this one catches all the little pieces and the pan's rubber strip hits flush to the floor to smoothly "on ramp" the pieces into the pan. Going to get another to brush up my hair in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Does the job at a low price
customer_reviews.text: Simply, it works great. No need to reinvent the wheel here. If you’re looking for a product that does what it’s supposed to do and for low price, this is it. I use it in the stained glass area of my studio to clear my (hard plastic) table of broken glass and extraneous bits of dried solder. Lightweight, sturdy... it’s not going to wake up in the morning and cook you breakfast, but you know. It’s a good tool.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan T.

customer_reviews.title: For my use, wish the bristles were stiffer.  Left handed people be ware.
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are fairly soft. The brush would be good for cleaning up soft material such as flour and sand, but I was using it on the sailboat for more caked on stuff, like bird droppings. I had to loosen them with the plastic back of the brush, and even then, hard to get the debris up. The bristles are already bending/breaking after one (extensive) use. The pointed tip is great, it gets into corners nicely. The contoured handle of brush is a nice design - as long as you are right handed. Would not work for left handed work. The orange color is not my favorite, but it does make it easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tapered brush; pan doesn't spill; wish it were wider
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice brush and pan. The brush tapers to a point at the end so it can reach into corners or a couple inches under our stove. The fact that the upper part of the dust pan (the part with the teeth) curls over the body of the pan helps keep crumbs in it (avoids spilling) when you carry it over to the wastebasket. The teeth work well at brushing dirt out of the bristles. I just wish the pan were a little wider. Few dustpans on Amazon are truly wide.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Broom is great...durability not so much. After a few months use the circle handle broke off. It isn’t essential to the product (though it did make it easier to use) so I didn’t worry about it. Now after having it a year and a half the rubber mat bit that meets the dust pan is peeling off. This is such a waste and means the whole thing is basically useless as dust/dirt won’t go into the pan. To throw the entire product away (which is all plastic) feels irresponsible and wasteful. Don’t understand why they didn’t design the rubber mat better or offer replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Kindra

customer_reviews.title: Not flat
customer_reviews.text: Looks great very strong only issue I have is the dust pan is not flushed with the ground so when uou sweep up dirt it all does not ghb o in. You kinda hotta hold it down o. The indide yo get dirt up
customer_reviews.author: Kristina S

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I'm brushing up debris from like
customer_reviews.text: I live in an ancient rowhouse with floors that have big gaps between the boards, and this thing is the only thing that gets cat litter out from between them. It has been a game changer. I feel like I'm brushing up debris from like, the 1800s with this thing. Thanks, brush and dustpan.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B.

customer_reviews.title: Great pan and broom.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my broken dust pan. In a 2 bedroom apartment with hard flooring throughout it is hard to keep a decent broom or pan. This has held up, its thick plastic and the edge does awesome at creating a sealing on the floor. The brush cleaner on the edge is extremely useful. I have also used the brush to clean out my car, as opposed to using a vacuum. I honestly prefer using the brush because it gets everything.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Burns

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t. You’ll be frustrated.
customer_reviews.text: I regret this purchase. Wish I could still return it. Unfortunately, you have to use it to understand it’s defects. The rubber lip at the end of the pan, that should sit flush with the floor so you can sweep the dirt/little boy crumbs into it, doesn’t have flex or the correct design to do that. The crumbs sweep under the pan again and again so you keep having to move the pan back and forth and brush like 4 or 5 times to pick up. So annoying especially during a pandemic lock down.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Siler

customer_reviews.title: Makes sweeping a breeze
customer_reviews.text: I love Casabella products. I find their products are intelligently designed. This broom and stand alone dustpan work perfectly as intended. The handle on the broom is comfortable and the set is easy to use. The dustpan holds the broom upright so it stores away easily. I also have their extendable duster which is the best duster I have ever used. I love this product and this company. I hope they keep bringing new products to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality And Works
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived in perfect condition and the quality was well more than I expected. I just wanted an item to clean up all of the wonderful dry cat food messes and small areas. Works great and zero spillage under the dustpan. The dustpan is good quality (people expecting?? For $10?) the dust brush is just superior and it has real deep grooves to remove hair and other nastiness. Totally happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: linchetto

customer_reviews.title: I didn't realise how important a good dustpan is
customer_reviews.text: This one goes nice and flat against the floor, and creates a perfect smooth slope for all of the dirt to get into it's inner reaches. The handle also slides in and fits tightly in gripping it on all sides so it doesn't fall out. The bristles are firm and strong, and oh so powerful, and puts a smile on my face while I clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Ice cream samarai salami

customer_reviews.title: Bristles are far apart
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace a set similar to this. The bristles on this brush are so far apart it’s ridiculous. And they are stiff, not soft. See photo. I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kearney Momma

customer_reviews.title: A very convienent and well made set.
customer_reviews.text: For my purposes, the most likeable thing about this set is that the brush fits into the open slot of the handle, so that they do not become separated after use. In the past, enevitably, one part of the set "disappeared". This was followed by lots of searching, swearing and blaming. Thank you Casabella, you made a good working tool for the household, at a most reasonable price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Best Dustbin set I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hand held set, It is the perfect size when I don't need to pull out my broom or vacuum.The brush has longer bristles with a tapered end so it is able to get under & behind those difficult spots a broom misses. The bristles are soft yet sturdy enough to use in the nooks and crannies on my thorough cleaning days around floorboard,windows and doors that the vac misses. It has a deep angle on the dustpan so it will hold quite a bit. It appears it will be a nice durable tool so I am hoping it will last me a while. The brush fits securely in the dustbin that is a plus too.
customer_reviews.author: consumer critic

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need it to be
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and ironically matches the other things I am using it with. A light weight sweeper, love the end for those corners and edges. The dustpan is nice and deep in height and scoop. Love that the sweeper fits into the handle of the dustpan snugly, yet easily. The handle is comfortable in the hand. And it will be easy to wash both pieces. Not too big, so you can put a Command hook to hang it where you need to use it. I have purchased Casabella products before and they are always attractive as well as functional.
customer_reviews.author: KissaMewTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Extremely high quality
customer_reviews.text: The dust pan is larger than most. The brush is the best I have ever used and I have used a lot. It cost a little more than I wanted to spend, but it is worth every penny. I highly recommend purchasing this product. I will buy more products from “casabella” manufacturer, because it is such a good quality product. I want to see if they have a full size broom similar to the brush that comes with this set.
customer_reviews.author: taskarnes

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed hand-held broom
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these. They really do the job well. The brush is wedge-shaped and the bristles are flexible so you can sweep up debris in corners and against floor boards. I use mine to sweep my hard floors (I have a small place). Easy to clean bristles. Dustpan holds the debris well. Thoughtful design.
customer_reviews.author: Watusi in Wahatchoo

customer_reviews.title: Competitively priced and super effective
customer_reviews.text: So far, I've been able to pick up fine dust, fur and even glass shards from another amazon order that didn't make it in one piece. This works very well, looks great (design) and is sturdy. Dust pan is better than my old one from another brand in the sense that lightweight pieces like hair/fur don't fly out. Worth the tiny investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cree

customer_reviews.title: #1 dustpan👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: I love the angled brush! Makes it so easy to get into the corners. There is a built in brush comber/cleaner, which is useful when you need to get out long hair that’s become tangled in the brush. The dustpan works great! The rubber along the edge is flexible and doesn’t allow dust and stuff to get swept under, causing you to have to need to sweep up the same spot repeatedly.
customer_reviews.author: Marika

customer_reviews.title: Great little brush/dustpan set!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my guinea pig’s cage cleaning time to replace the small dustpan from Dollar Tree I’d been using. I have 24 ft of cage space to clean, so I needed a better brush. This one was PERFECT! It’s the right size to hold about a day’s worth of piggie poop 😂 and the teeth on the dustpan are perfect for scraping hay and stray poo from the bristles. This even replaced the small wet/dry vac I got specifically to clean their cage!
customer_reviews.author: sam dickran

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect and well priced!
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with this dustpan and brush. It’s lightweight but sturdy. Easy enough for my children to use and clean up small messes. I use it too and find it very easy to use. This was a great find and well priced! Wish I had found it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Mom

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with a torn-in-half product description tag (so there were no clear instructions on how the broom could function). Also, the rubber front part of the dust pan was ripped almost half way. The exchange was very easy. A new broom arrived within 2 days. This time the tag was intact but the rubber on the dust pan was torn again. So frustrated I am choosing not to return again and will most likely end up ripping the rubber off to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rasmussen-Marcum

customer_reviews.title: Brush is too cheap
customer_reviews.text: The brush bristles are too few and the dirt just goes between them. Also they are not feathered at the bottom so you have to brush several times to catch everything. It needs to have a more dense brush with feathered tips.
customer_reviews.author: Jay W

customer_reviews.title: Great sweep set! Wish the broom was taller
customer_reviews.text: I love having a sweep set! We have hardwood floors, a dog, a toddler, and a baby. I can't believe I lasted this long without it. The bristles are nice and soft and thick for sweeping. The dust pan is great and I enjoy not having to bend over. They click together easily for storage, and I like the padded grips on the handle of the broom. Now I can sweep quietly instead of running the vacuum while babies are sleeping :) my only complaint-I wish the broom was a little taller so that I didn't have to bend down to get under tables, etc.
customer_reviews.author: LMB

customer_reviews.title: VERY narrow
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid more attention to the dimensions; I thought dustpans were all the same size. This one is VERY narrow and small. The brush bristles got bent out of shape after the second or third use; it looked like it was 10 yrs old in one month.
customer_reviews.author: SB-9

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Now I I honestly don't care about the flap coming off like the other reviews this is going to be used for my monthly hamster cage cleaning it's the perfect size for the critter nation to get the job done faster during bedding clean up this is just perfect for my use!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie LeClercq

customer_reviews.title: Very Brittle, Broke Very Easily
customer_reviews.text: The material is far too brittle for an item like this. Ours shattered under normal use. I tried to salvage it with a heavy dose of JB Weld, but soon enough the rest of it shattered as well. Pass on this
customer_reviews.author: Your Anonymous Online Friend

customer_reviews.title: ADD IT ON YOU GUYS
customer_reviews.text: Prime add-on, so I put it in my cart bc I needed one to begin with. I thought it would be tiny and cheaply made but it’s actually great quality and the perfect size. Not too wide like most are, and it’s not as shallow. Makes it so much easier for keeping things in the dustpan instead of falling out on the sides. It also has a little razored edge at the deep end to keep it slightly covered so that nothing can be blown out, and to pull out debris from your brush when you comb it thru.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: A nice, compact and effective combo
customer_reviews.text: How hard can it be to find a good dust pan and a brush? Not that easy these days given the low quality of most of the junk out there. This set is quite satisfactory. Use it all the time to quickly pick up debris around the shop.
customer_reviews.author: FIllC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect house dust pan and brush
customer_reviews.text: I like this pan brush combo. Check to see if it's the width you desire. I use it to bush up food from the kids and regular house floor debris. Soft enough for my wood floors so it does not scratch it. I comboed it with a hook system that holds brooms and mops. All works perfectly together.
customer_reviews.author: Midwayflex1

customer_reviews.title: Comfy broom
customer_reviews.text: This broom is super comfortable to use. I mean it's a broom, at least that's what I thought when I bought it, but it is really comfortable in your hands, it stores really nicely, and it was a huge upgrade from my last broom that was 10 years old and held together with duct tape. I would definitely buy this again. Feels like it'll stand the test of time. My only issue is it's a little hard to empty the dust pan without detaching it from the handle, but that's mostly because the area where my trash can is is too narrow to do so.
customer_reviews.author: STPJimmy

customer_reviews.title: Sweet sweeper, but too tall
customer_reviews.text: The broom has good stiff bristles for my kitchen and balcony floors. The handle is nicely cushioned too. I like how it fits into the dust pan and is compact for storage. I have a tight cabinet that I store my brrom on and was drawn to this broom because of the handle length. However, once you fit the broom into the dustpan , the length is increased so it will not fit. I still use it, I just have to store it somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: A. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great dustpan
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous dust pan. It may seem silly to rave about something so silly, but our old one was awful and this has changed the way we feel about our floors. The brush is pointed so we can get the crud out of corners without a lot of effort, and the pan is deep to contain dust instead of letting it escape. It’s just awesome.
customer_reviews.author: La

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY & PERFORMANCE
customer_reviews.text: I did not think buying a dustpan and brush would make that much of a difference. But, it has made sweeping up kitty litter a less laboring process. This brush sweeps up every piece of clay. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MB.5

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: One of first dust pans I have ever bought that actually picks up the dirt without 5 passes! It sits even on the floor without either having to hold the edge down with my foot or my hand and gets everything in one pass. This was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: KaJen

customer_reviews.title: Nice little set
customer_reviews.text: I got this one to sweep up around my cat's litter box (he likes to throw a little litter whenever he uses his box) and it's just the right size for the area I store it in and the area I use it in. Sweeps up on the first go over, which is nice and decreases dust.
customer_reviews.author: K. KingTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mop. But a bit expensive. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: A very good mop. The handle is very comfortable to hold. And the collector stands upright which is extremely convenient. It also has a hook where you can attach the mop. The tooth on the side helps in cleaning out the mop while using it. Makes life much easier. My wife loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Sharif S.

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I luv the dust pan it's wise angle allowed for larger broom usage as well. Wasnt to impressed with the brush to much. The way the brush is shaped seems worth work great id toy hold ir the same way each time you use it. But when u sweep the opposite direction it's alot harder to sweep controllably
customer_reviews.author: D.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Although I found cheaper ones in discount stores I'm glad I bought this one. The best I've ever had. Sturdy, lightweight and I like the teeth to clean the brush. I've even used it on my broom. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: End of bending and backaches from sweeping!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I never knew clean up could be so easy! Our kitchen is being renovated and every day there's a mess--the guys are very good about cleaning up afterward, and they got to use this broom and dustpan before I did. I didn't think I'd ever get a chance to use it. All the guys were very impressed with it, and I could see why once I got to use it. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Suemcl

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I have an older version of this broom and dustpan which I love. This one came and is not the same quality. The dustpan is bent in the center so whenever you try to sweep debris into it, almost everything just goes right underneath it. This is useless to me. Otherwise it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Sly

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I had one I previously bought from Meijer but my husband accidentally broke it.... couldn't get at Meijer anymore and was so sad. When I found it on Amazon, I couldn't believe it! Love this thing.... remember that little line of dirt your current broom and dustpan never picks up...?? Well not this one! It gets everything up! and is great for getting in corners and edges around your kitchen or bathroom. I buy these as housewarming gifts I love it so much! great product.
customer_reviews.author: rachelle

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed in the $30 spent
customer_reviews.text: Sparse. I would use that word to describe the amount of bristles on the broom head. I'm positive that dust and bits of dirt will squeeze by. The cheap broom it was supposed to replace has many more bristles and has a wider head while the Casabella head is tiny. Basically it's a lot more practical than the expensive set I just got. I'm disappointed in the $30 spent. The dust pan is decent though. It sits flush across the floor and feels sturdy. I would recommend against buying this. If the broom were higher quality (more bristles and wider head) I'd give the set five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Handy to have
customer_reviews.text: The brush fits and holds nicely inside the dustpan, so you know where both parts are, nothing is getting lost. Works great, glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: AlyssaK

customer_reviews.title: Smaller and Less Technical Than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The hand broom doesn't do a great job sweeping, rather its more of a lint roller that just collects everything inside the bristles. Go to a garage sale and get your hands on an old industrial classic. I will be giving this away, I'd rather just use a vacuum attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Like The Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Much sturdier than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly expecting this to be kind of flimsy, which was fine, as I am using it only for our tent when we go camping. I was pleasantly surprised at how sturdy it felt. I may buy one for my house as well. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jvic

customer_reviews.title: Clean sweep for Casabella
customer_reviews.text: Wife really likes this pan and uses it all the time, even though she had purchased another from Target not knowing I had purchased this. The Target model does not have the rubber lip and no attached brush. Works great for small cleanups and seems to be of good quality. Really like the little cleaning grooves since we often sweep up dog hair and this feature helps keep the brush clean.
customer_reviews.author: OBG

customer_reviews.title: It does it's job
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace an old dustpan and bought this one. It works well. I love that the bristles are stiffer than my last one because it's easier to sweep up my groovy wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Forrester

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little broom and dustpan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this only to use as a table cleaner for my restored wood table (restoration hardware with all the nooks and crannies in the wood). Impossible to get the crumbs out otherwise, this has been a lifesaver. I got the cute little tiny table brushes first but they were terrible, don't waste your time on those unless your table is tiny. Mine is 72 inches and this brush is great.
customer_reviews.author: rlazar

customer_reviews.title: I turned to Amazon since delivery is always so quick and easy, and saw the excellent reviews for this set
customer_reviews.text: My handyman walked off with my other dustpan and brush, which had to be about 20 years old, forcing me to buy another set. I turned to Amazon since delivery is always so quick and easy, and saw the excellent reviews for this set. I am very pleased with my purchase and am now glad that my handyman's "sticky fingers" prompted me to buy this!! So I guess the moral to this story is, "all's well that ends well!"
customer_reviews.author: crystal lynn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic dustpan set!
customer_reviews.text: My old dustpan set had gotten warped and no longer picked up dirt that I brushed toward it, plus the brush was getting worn. I read the reviews and got this one - what a revelation! I know it's a simple thing, but the angled bristles on the brush have just the right stiffness to get into every corner and crevice without flinging the dirt everywhere. The dustpan lies flat to the ground so you can sweep up every last speck. I couldn't be happier. A total win!
customer_reviews.author: CRussin

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product in everyway
customer_reviews.text: I needed a handbroom and dustpan in a pinch for a small price. This combo is more than worth the money. The dustpan is sturdy and perfect for interior and exterior use. The angled broom is fantastic for getting into corners. Epic color combo.
customer_reviews.author: Nik Rustic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small pickups and for picking up piles after using a broom
customer_reviews.text: Having a small dustpan and brush to pick up piles after using a broom or just using them or quick pickups in a smaller area has been very handy. The dustpan and brush are well made and easy to use. The dustpan seals to the floor well and doesn't allow anything to go underneath the strip. Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LindyLouTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Cool little broom set
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy, it doesn't feel too big for a small broom set or too small, and it isn't a bland white color. The dustpan is super awesome because it's tall and rounded in the back so the stuff doesn't go up in the air and in your face
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Light, easy to use, easy to clean and takes up barely any space as the brush fits perfects into the pan! Color is nice and material sturdy. Is neither too small or too big! Perfect for cleaning my balcony and around the cat litter box!
customer_reviews.author: FeedBurner

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job, nice heft and stores well
customer_reviews.text: It's a good light use dust pan and brush. It's on the small size but that's what I wanted to store out of the way in the kitchen to sweep up scraps. Works great, I like the contoured brush head for getting into corners. Good price, well made, solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Thoughtful design, well made.
customer_reviews.text: The brush and pan are made of quality materials and they fit together snugly for storage. The rear edge of the pan is designed to clean dirt off the brush, which is useful. Also the pan is quite deep. A thoughtfully designed product.
customer_reviews.author: John Tebbutt

customer_reviews.title: They've changed since the last time I bought this product.
customer_reviews.text: What had been reliable and sturdy showed up flimsy and poorly-made. I was buying a second one because I loved the first one so much. Sorely disappointed. Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scholar Mama

customer_reviews.title: great cleaning tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality, well-made cleaning tool and does exactly what it's supposed to do, and does it ergonomically. I bought it to spot clean my short-napped carpet and clean around my bird cages. Makes a quick job of it! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Moncrief

customer_reviews.title: Great dustan
customer_reviews.text: It's a dustpan, and it does it's job really well! My almost two year old daughter loves to use this to sweep up messes. Unfortunately she's typically also the root cause of those messes at which point i have to clean them up. It's a great brush with a sturdy pan, If you're on Amazon looking for a dustpan, you can do no better.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat who sheds like the dickens and live in an apartment that draws dust to it. The broom helps me keep control. It gets into the corners easily which is big.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Standel

customer_reviews.title: the rubber ramp does a great job at catching everything I sweep
customer_reviews.text: Thank god a real dust pan. If a dust pan doesn't have a rubber ramp at the tip of it, it shouldn't be called a dust pan. All that "plastic thing" will do is allow everthing you swept to go right under it! This DUST PAN, however, has a brush with rigid brittles that I can tell will last a very long time. Additionally, the rubber ramp does a great job at catching everything I sweep.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Roa

customer_reviews.title: Love the rubber edge
customer_reviews.text: Love the rubber edge, makes sure everything gets swept up instead of that aggravation of having to do multiple goes to get every little bit of dirt. The brush snapping in is convenient too, though I keep them stored on separate hooks because the pail alone is great for catching things I sweep off the counter or table. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after two years
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea but poorly made. The rubber strip along the edge of the dust pan tore on both sides, part of the catch to hold the dust pan in the closed position broke off. The dustpan is no longer usable.
customer_reviews.author: magda

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality dust pan.
customer_reviews.text: Broke on the first use. The dust pan broke near the ha doe the first time I used it. The brush is nice and still usable.
customer_reviews.author: tklimek

customer_reviews.title: The brush has sturdy but not stiff bristles
customer_reviews.text: This hand broom and dustpan set works really well. You can get into the corners any time or before you vacuum to really get the dust and those dust bunnies out. I also used it to brush up stray pine needles and mulch off my composite porch. The brush has sturdy but not stiff bristles. The lip of the dustpan stays flat so nothing gets away. Also, the set is very sturdy plastic that feels durable. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G.D. Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Average quality and describes sign. Good for the money until you can get one you really like, or can use in limited capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley E Janke

customer_reviews.title: Fancy color, but BASIC dustpan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dustpan to upgrade from my dollar store dustpan, but the pan got leaned on too hard and it cracked the plastic. This dustpan is good for basic use but it isn't anymore than a typical plastic dustpan. The plastic is thin and is not very heavy duty. I say all this to lower any expectation that this dustpan might be better than others generic options. Its not, just a nicer color than the typical white ones.
customer_reviews.author: kth

customer_reviews.title: The front rubber strip is so thin it tore during shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The dust pan arrived with a 2" tear in the rubber strip at the front, just from jostling around in the shipping box. Looking at it from the side, it's so thin where it tore I think it wouldn't have lasted long during regular use anyway. I don't know why they pinch it so thin right in the middle of the strip, it's almost like they're perforating it for ease of tearing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came with rubber edge torn out of the box...
customer_reviews.text: Came with the rubber part that goes on the edge already ripped about 1in.. I used packing tape to repair right out of the box.. bought another brand around the same price.. much nicer
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to quickly sweep up kitty litter and other small messes that don't require a full floor sweep.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Handy set
customer_reviews.text: I like how the brush fits inside the handle of the pan and that the pan has deep sides.. We keep it next to our wood stove and use it to sweep up bits of wood and ash.
customer_reviews.author: ADK

customer_reviews.title: Dust pan
customer_reviews.text: Trashed it. Dust pan ok but brush very cheap. Bristles frayed after few uses. Never completely swept debri into pan. Always left something on floor.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Duda

customer_reviews.title: The best I have tried
customer_reviews.text: Most of the dusters are not working well because the edge is not even and close to the floor. This duster has a rubber edge, so it resolved the two issues. The price and quality are reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: VD Studio

customer_reviews.title: Great design, not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this less than a month ago. I love the concept - light weight, handy and versatile. After about 2 or 3 weeks a piece broke off the dustpan so that now it has to stay in the open position. It is still usable in the open position but I'll probably have to replace it with another brand because part of the reason I wanted this was that the pan folded up to put it away. I loved before the break, wish it had lasted. The swivel part of the pan should be made of something more durable than plastic.
customer_reviews.author: T. Saxton

customer_reviews.title: ... store and needed an item similar to this for easy cleanup. I bought this set and the broom ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a small retail store and needed an item similar to this for easy cleanup. I bought this set and the broom broke within a week. I think there is a manufacturer defect as the stress point appears right above where it attaches to the handle. The bristles are very soft also and doesnt work well on concrete. Not worth the $$$
customer_reviews.author: NAbood

customer_reviews.title: Deep but small.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller that we thought it would be, cannot easily use a normal broom with it, it's too small. But it is nice and deep for bigger messes.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: How much better it takes up what I swept
customer_reviews.text: What I brush up in my Apt. w/ the dust pan I had been using for a # of years, that wouldn't pick up everything and I'd have to go over and over. Once I bought this and sweep everything in a pile I use the Casabella dustpan and brushset and it comes up like that!
customer_reviews.author: lori lewis

customer_reviews.title: Dustpan Does NOT Lay Flat
customer_reviews.text: The rubber part of the dustpan does not lay flat on the floor. When trying to sweep up dirt and/cat litter, it doesn't make it in the dustpan. It all ends up being swept under the pan. I bought two of these together and both have the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: CeeMonster

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and durable
customer_reviews.text: The sweep set is very versatile. It has lasted well for two years so far. It tucks away nicely, the soft grip is comfortable on hand. The protection on the dustpan is effective. I would have liked the handle either adjustable or a little longer. Overall, I haven't had anything as good.
customer_reviews.author: Ken A

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I never had a dustpan with a long handle before and what a difference it makes. No more bending over to sweep dirt into the pan. I'll choose sweeping now over vacuuming for our tile and hardwood floors. The only way I could see improving this item is if the broom handle telescoped to different lengths. It's a little long for one handed usage. But overall, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Valencia Artist

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised at the durability!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dust pan and broom for our camping trips to the lake. I used it to clean many things. I even used it to clean out the fire pit. I was worried the rubber trim might fall of or break, but it did not. It held up and was easy to use. It was the perfect size and held a lot of debris. The brushes bristles were not too stiff and did not leave a trail of dirt like some brooms do. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bristow

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Purchaced this to easily clean our rooftop tent because I needed something small for the small-ish space. Works like a charm. Product is not flimsy, it has good quality. Would definantly buy again for using around the house. Love it for camping and easily stores together so the broom and pan are'nt separated.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Sills

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: It's great if you want to quick sweep small areas up without having to bust out the vacuum. I use this almost everyday when I clean our Kittys litter area as she gets sand outside of her litter box and it works perfectly. I def recommend this product. It's lasted me quite some time and still feels brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with this set. So easy to use and seemed sturdy. Then it cracked and the rubber came off. I wouldn’t rebuy this due to how long it held up. The broom is great the dust pan was disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Pimpers83

product_meta.title: Casabella 1 Count Dustpan and Brush Set, EA, Orange and Graphite
product_meta.description: Style Name:Dustpan and BrushCasabella Dustpan and Brush Set in Graphite/Orange. Pointed brush tip gets into cracks and small areas with ease. Handle angles up for more ergonomic use. Soft rubber lip fits flat against the floor maximizing pick up. Soft grip handled brush fits snugly into dustpan for easy storage. Built in comb on dustpan cleans dirt from brush bristles. Measures 12-1/2-Inch by 9-3/4-Inch by 5-Inch. Casabella has been focused on offering the highest quality materials combined with custom designs and unparalleled product innovation for 25 years. We continue to provide tools to make you life easier. Casabella. Designed for the way you live.
feature_bullets: Built in comb on dustpan cleans dirt from brush
Casabella Dustpan and Brush Set, Graphite/Orange
Pointed brush tip designed to get into cracks and small areas

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,078 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
